title: Base Artifact Schema
description: Schema defining required fields for any collected artifact in ShadowAudit.

host_id.description: Unique identifier of the host where the artifact was collected

source.description: Subsystem or module name that generated the artifact (e.g., filesystem, registry)

collected_at.description: UTC timestamp in ISO 8601 format when the artifact was collected

artifact_type.description: Logical classification of the artifact (e.g., file_scan, task_scheduled)

evidence_type.description: Type of forensic evidence (e.g., persistence, execution, anomaly)
